### 🤔 Problem / Use Case
What problem would this feature solve? What’s missing or frustrating?

Describe the feature you’d like to see.

### 🔄 Alternatives Considered
Any workarounds or other features you’ve considered?

### 🖼️ UI / UX Mockups (optional)
Add wireframes, screenshots, or diagrams if applicable.

### ➕ Additional Context
Anything else we should know?
